subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: A day before the season started, Jason Terry had a tattoo of the championship trophy inked on his right biceps, a sign of supreme confidence in the Mavericks’ mission to win a title.
snippet: A day before the season started, Jason Terry had a tattoo of the championship trophy inked on his right biceps, a sign of supreme confidence in the Mavericks’ mission to win a title.
